basics.name: Ali Hajiabadi
basics.label: Postdoctoral Researcher
basics.summary: I am a postdoctoral researcher at ETH Zurich. I completed my PhD at National University of Singapore. My research is focused on Systems Security and Hardware/Software Co-design.

work.name: ETH Zurich
work.summary: Research: CPU and DRAM security, novel attacks and defenses for modern computing systems.
